medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Woke up yesterday morning with diffuse lower abdominal pain. Progressively worse throughout the day, requiring the patient to unbutton his pants. Episodes of diarrhea at 2 pm and 4 pm, with one episode of emesis. Symptoms aggravated by a long car ride and changes in diet including an increase in fatty food and alcohol over the past few weekends.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Coronary Artery Disease, Hypertension, Dyslipidemia, Skin cancer (basal cell/squamous cell) excision x 3, Asymmetric prostate.
medical_history.family_history: Father died at age ___ from a stroke. Uncle also died from a stroke. Maternal grandfather died at age ___ of CAD. Mother has PVD.
